info.title: Benefits RP
info.description: Azure Benefits RP let users create and manage benefits like savings plan.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: URL for checking the ongoing status of the operation.

Retry-After.description: Clients should wait for the Retry-After interval before polling again

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Elevate as owner on savings plan order based on billing permissions.

get.description: List savings plans in an order.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by reservation properties. The filter supports 'eq', 'or', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', or 'not'. Reservation properties include sku/name, properties/{appliedScopeType, archived, displayName, displayProvisioningState, effectiveDateTime, expiryDate, provisioningState, quantity, renew, reservedResourceType, term, userFriendlyAppliedScopeType, userFriendlyRenewState}

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: May be used to sort order by reservation properties.

parameters.name: refreshSummary
parameters.description: To indicate whether to refresh the roll up counts of the savings plans group by provisioning states

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: The number of savings plans to skip from the list before returning results

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: To number of savings plans to return

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed
Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Calculates the refund amounts in EA account and price of the corresponding new purchases in MCA account.
post.description: Calculates price for migrating `SavingsPlans` from EA to MCA account.

202.description: The request is accepted and is being processed.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: URL for checking the ongoing status of the operation.

Location.description: URL for determining when an operation has completed. Only use this value only when Azure-AsyncOperation isn't returned.

Retry-After.description: Clients should wait for the Retry-After interval before polling again

Sku.description: The SKU to be applied for this resource

name.description: Name of the SKU to be applied

systemData.description: SystemData of Savings plan order alias.

savingsPlanOrderId.description: Identifier of the savings plan created

BillingScopeId.description: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing SavingsPlan

BillingProfileId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the billing profile where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Field-led or Customer-led customers.

CustomerId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the customer where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Partner-led customers.

BillingAccountId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the billing account where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Enterprise Agreement customers.

ReservedResourceType.description: The type of the resource that is being reserved.

BillingPlan.description: Represents the billing plan in ISO 8601 format. Required only for monthly billing plans.

BenefitTerm.description: Represent SavingsPlan term in ISO 8601 format.

AppliedScopeProperties.description: Properties specific to applied scope type. Not required if not applicable.

TenantId.description: Tenant ID where the savings plan should apply benefit.

ManagementGroupId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the management group where the benefit must be applied.

ResourceGroupId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the resource group.

Renew.description: Setting this to true will automatically purchase a new savings plan on the expiration date time.

trend.description: The number of days trend for a savings plan

aggregates.description: The array of aggregates of a savings plan's utilization

UtilizationAggregates.description: The aggregate values of savings plan utilization

grainUnit.description: The grain unit of the aggregate

EffectiveDateTime.description: DateTime of the savings plan starts providing benefit from.

PurchaseDateTime.description: Date time when the savings plan was purchased

BenefitStartTime.description: This is the DateTime when the savings plan benefit started.

nextLink.description: Url to get the next page.

additionalProperties.description: The roll out count summary of the savings plans

displayProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the savings plan for display, e.g. Succeeded

userFriendlyAppliedScopeType.description: The applied scope type of the savings plan for display, e.g. Shared

nextLink.description: Url to get the next page.

currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

BillingPlanInformation.description: Information describing the type of billing plan for this savings plan.

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount of money to be paid for the Order. Tax is not included.

startDate.description: Date when the billing plan has started.

nextPaymentDueDate.description: For recurring billing plans, indicates the date when next payment will be processed. Null when total is paid off.

PaymentDetail.description: Information about payment related to a savings plan order.

dueDate.description: Date when the payment needs to be done.

paymentDate.description: Date when the transaction is completed. Is null when it is scheduled.

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount in pricing currency. Tax not included.

billingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount charged in Billing currency. Tax not included. Is null for future payments

PaymentStatus.description: Describes whether the payment is completed, failed, cancelled or scheduled in the future.

message.description: The message giving detailed information about the status code.

nextLink.description: Url to get the next page.

valid.description: Indicates if the provided input was valid

reasonCode.description: Failure reason code if the provided input was invalid

reason.description: Failure reason if the provided input was invalid

SavingsPlanOrderAliasAuditRequest.description: Request to audit savings plan purchase

SavingsPlanOrderAliasAuditRequestPropert.description: Properties to audit savings plan purchase

orderId.description: Order ID of the savings plan in guid form

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Pricing amount of savings plan purchase

PricingCurrencyDuration.description: Represents either billing plan or savings plan term in ISO 8601 format.

displayName.description: Friendly name of the savings plan

OperationResultError.description: Required if status == failed or status == canceled.

code.description: Required if status == failed or status == cancelled. If status == failed, provide an invariant error code used for error troubleshooting, aggregation, and analysis.

message.description: Required if status == failed. Localized. If status == failed, provide an actionable error message indicating what error occurred, and what the user can do to address the issue.

id.description: It should match what is used to GET the operation result.

name.description: It must match the last segment of the id field, and will typically be a GUID / system generated value.

sessionId.description: The session id of this calculate migration cost operation.

savingsPlansToPurchase.description: Details of the savings plans being purchased

savingsPlansToExchange.description: Details of the reservations being returned

displayName.description: Friendly name of the Savings Plan

quantity.description: Quantity to purchase. Must be greater than zero.

reservationId.description: Fully qualified id of the SavingsPlan being returned.

quantity.description: Quantity to be exchanged. Must be greater than zero.

SavingsPlanSummaryCount.description: The roll up count summary of savings plans in each state

succeededCount.description: The number of savings plans in Succeeded state

failedCount.description: The number of savings plans in Failed state

expiringCount.description: The number of savings plans in Expiring state

expiredCount.description: The number of savings plans in Expired state

pendingCount.description: The number of savings plans in Pending state

cancelledCount.description: The number of savings plans in Cancelled state

processingCount.description: The number of savings plans in Processing state

noBenefitCount.description: The number of savings plans in No Benefit state

warningCount.description: The number of savings plans in Warning state

SavingsPlanOrderAliasNameParameter.description: Name of the savings plan order alias

SavingsPlanOrderAliasRequestParameter.name: body
SavingsPlanOrderAliasRequestParameter.description: Request body for creating a savings plan order alias

ApiVersionParameter.description: The api-version to be used by the service

ExpandParameter.name: $expand
ExpandParameter.description: May be used to expand the detail information of some properties.

SavingsPlanOrderIdParameter.name: savingsPlanOrderId
SavingsPlanOrderIdParameter.description: Order ID of the savings plan

SavingsPlanUpdateRequestParameter.name: body
SavingsPlanUpdateRequestParameter.description: Request body for patching a savings plan order alias

SavingsPlanPurchaseValidateRequestParame.name: body
SavingsPlanPurchaseValidateRequestParame.description: Request body for validating the purchase of a savings plan

SavingsPlanUpdateValidateRequestParamete.name: body
SavingsPlanUpdateValidateRequestParamete.description: Request body for validateing a savings plan patch request

CalculateMigrationCostRequestParameter.name: body
CalculateMigrationCostRequestParameter.description: Request body for migrating all savings plan order into mca account

SavingsPlanOrderAliasAuditRequestParamet.name: body
SavingsPlanOrderAliasAuditRequestParamet.description: Request body for auditing a savings plan order alias
